content: Docker Daily Tips clear all containers docker stop $(docker ps -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) docker pull:error response from daemon yum install bind-utils dig @114.114.114.114 registry-1.docker.io echo "54.175.43.85 registry-1.docker.io'" >> /etc/hosts

content: Linux Daily Tips clear file cat /dev/null > file xargs ls ./* | xargs -i cp {} /tmp/ sed sed -i 's/password: .*/password: 123456/g' file awk cat file | awk '$1 ~ /th/ {print $1}' ignore error message unalias cp 2>/dev/null || true file append content echo 'content' >> file
